131547.release_notes:
Import Settings
------------------------------------
New options allow for custom pin dimensions or automatic framing based on the exact dimensions of original Pinterest pin images.

Persistent Authorization
------------------------------------
The plugin now retains your Pinterest authorization between sessions, so you no longer need to reauthorize each time.

Pinterest Account Management
------------------------------------
You can now unlink your Pinterest account from the plugin, making it easier to switch between multiple accounts as needed.

Additional Improvements
------------------------------------
The interface has been reorganized with separate tabs for Boards and Import Settings to improve usability. Clearer status messages offer better feedback during the import process. Authorization errors and expired tokens are now handled more gracefully with automatic recovery.

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

accepted.name: Muhammad Faizan Atiq
accepted.description: Hey there! I’m a design nerd with a big love for systems that turn ideas into magic. Every pixel counts, every pattern tells a story!

plugins.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search—pause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer✨ ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.name: 语言文本替换工具
plugins.description:
使用流程


快速将设计稿中的文本替换为目标语言，只需以下几步：


  1. 选中设计元素或画板 在Figma中，选中需要替换文本的设计元素或整个画板（提示：确保选中的元素包含需要替换的文本图层）
  2. 打开插件 在Figma顶部菜单栏中，点击“插件” > 搜索并打开“多国语言文本替换”（或通过快捷方式运行）
  3. 上传翻译文档 在插件界面中，点击“上传文件”按钮，选择你的 .xlsx 翻译文档。 注意：翻译文档需按照以下规范准备：
  4. 文档必须包含两列：第一列为源文本，第二列为目标文本。
  5. 默认列名：A1 为“源文本”（如“英语”），B1 为“目标文本”（如“阿拉伯语”）
  6. 输入源文本与目标文本列名 在插件界面的输入框中，输入或确认翻译文档中的源文本列名（例如“英语”）和目标文本列名（例如“阿拉伯语”）
  7. 点击“开始替换” 确认无误后，点击插件界面上的“开始替换”按钮。 插件会自动扫描选中的设计元素，匹配源文本并替换为目标文本，同时保持原始布局不变
  8. 查看替换结果
plugins.tagline: 语言文本替换工具

plugins.name: Randominator
plugins.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
plugins.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

plugins.name: Companion
plugins.description:
Advanced Color Finder [PRO Feature]

A powerful tool that allows you to search for colors across your files.

  1. Ultra-fast search algorithm with advanced labeling
  2. Colors are grouped by type (variable or style) and by source (Remote or local libraries)
  3. Ability to search by variable name, color hex and by layer name
  4. Display number of matching results per color
  5. Select all or individual layers that matches the selected color


Style Guide Generator [Free]

  1. Transform your color collections into a beautiful style guide
  2. Choose one or more color formats to display (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  3. Support for cross-collections linked variables


Contrast Checker [Free]

  1. Check for AA and AAA level compliance
  2. Interactive and instant results when adjusting colors
  3. Live preview and swap foreground and background colors
  4. Get results for for text (Small / Large) and graphics elements


Tints & Shades Generator [Free]

  1. Interactive generator with live colors preview
  2. Ability to customize the number of generated colors
  3. Built-in contrast checker
  4. Preview generated colors on canvas
  5. Save generated colors to variables


Color Converter [Free]

  1. Convert any given color to popular color formats
  2. Currently supports HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, HSV, OKLCH and LAB
  3. Select and copy results


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Sort Layers [Free]

A set of different ways to sort your layers within Figma.

  1. Alphabetical sorting (A-Z or Z-A)
  2. Sort by X or Y position on the canvas
  3. Sort by layer type (Frame, text, group, section, etc…)
  4. Reverse current sorting
  5. Magically sort everything based on names and positions


Distribute Layers [Free]

A powered up version of Figma’s built-in distribute feature.

  1. Distribute selected layers horizontally or vertically
  2. Set a desired value for the space between layers
  3. Ability to align layers from top (in horizontal mode) or left (in vertical mode)


Display As Grid [Free]

Quickly rearrange selected layers in a grid layout with improved alignment and sorting features

  1. Ability to choose the number of columns along with vertical and horizontal gaps
  2. Ability to align columns vertically or not
  3. Extra sorting capabilities for better organization


Hidden Layers [PRO Feature]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage hidden layers. It allows you to

  1. Hide selected layers
  2. Show all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  3. Select all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  4. Delete all hidden layers within a page or within a selection


Locked Layers [Free]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage locked layers. It allows you to

  1. Lock or unlock selected layers
  2. Lock or unlock all layers on a page


Remove Numbers [PRO Feature]

Get rid of all those annoying numbers that Figma automatically generates. A single click gets the job done


Ungroup Single Layers Group [PRO Feature]

Optimize your files by ungrouping single layers group or deleting empty groups


Start at 0, 0 [PRO Feature]

It’s just the cherry on top. A file is never tidy unless you start at 0, 0 — and for that, we got you covered


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Fix Detached Instances [PRO Feature]

Preview and fix all detached instances within your files.

  1. Find all detached instances across pages
  2. Preview of the original component versus the detached instance
  3. Link instance to original component
  4. Maintain all manual overrides


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Deep Search [PRO Feature]

Deep Search is a unique and ultra-fast way to find any layer within your file, in a simple yet powerful search tool. The search algorithm has been thoroughly optimized for speed, especially for large files.


Below is how it works:

  1. Start by selecting the layer type (Frame, text, rectangle, etc.) or choose “All Layers” to search everything
  2. Choose one or more properties to search for (Fill color, width, font, opacity and many many more). You can also use the Quick Search box to search for any property from the list for easier access
  3. Hit the search button and voilà. Results are there.
  4. Browse the list of matching search results, with ability to filter by layer name.
  5. Click on a result to view it on the canvas or click “Select All” to bulk select all matching results


Here are some example scenarios:

  1. [Simple] ― Find all text layers with the font “Inter” and font weight “Semi Bold”
  2. [Simple] ― Find all rectangles with a corner radius of 16 and corner smoothing of 60%
  3. [Medium] ― Find all instances of a component named “Button” that are hidden and have been detached
  4. [Medium] ― Find all auto layouts that have a minimum width of at least 393px
  5. [Advanced] ― Find all instances of an external library component named “Input” that are marked as ready for dev and whose top left corner radius is less than or equal to 20px
  6. [Advanced] ― Find all layers that have a hidden stroke, have a blend mode applied and whose name include the characters “es”


In short, the possibilities are endless


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


MagiConnect [PRO Feature]

MagiConnect is a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to draw connectors between your frames


Here are some key features:

  1. Auto-draw mode: When enabled, it allows you to quickly draw connectors between any two elements you select on the canvas. The direction of the connector arrow is based on the selection order
  2. Manual mode was designed to give you more flexibility in accessing nested layers before drawing a connector. It’s slower for sure, but gives you more control
  3. You can customize the connector by adjusting the color, opacity, stroke width, radius and stroke style
  4. If you’re not happy with the connector customizations, you can always reset all values to their default state from the manage menu
  5. You can also add an optional description to annotate the connector
  6. The tool will always remember your last used settings whenever it’s launched the next time.
  7. You can update specific connectors within a selection or update globally across a page
  8. In cases where a fresh start is the way to go, simple go to “Manage” and select “Remove all connectors”. This will delete all connectors you’ve added on this page


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


When you purchase the license, you will get a lifetime unlimited access to the plugin, and all to the upcoming features that i’m planning to add. Some really exciting features are coming soon. This is truly the beginning.


Due to limitations from Figma, you can only access PRO features from the account you purchased the license on. You will not be able to access PRO features from connected accounts and must purchase the license again if you want to use it on another account.


Future releases of the plugin might not be at the current price tag.


If you made it this far, I salute you for your patience.


For any questions, ideas, bugs or complaints, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out.


Built with ❤️
plugins.tagline: The all-in-one plugin you never knew you needed

plugins.name: Mots AI
plugins.description:
Elevate your UI designs with this intelligent Figma plugin that generates smart, context-aware text tailored to your needs. Powered by advanced AI technology, it streamlines your content creation process, allowing you to quickly produce engaging copy for various UI components.


Seamless Integration:


This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Figma workflow. Simply highlight the text area in your design that requires content, specify the context, and select the appropriate UI component. It will generate customized, realistic text that perfectly complements your design, saving you valuable time and effort.


Intuitive User Experience:


Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this plugin boasts an intuitive interface that allows designers to focus on their creative process. It currently supports English language generation, with plans to expand language support in future updates. The plugin adapts to your needs, making it an indispensable tool for designers seeking to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.


How to use this plugin:


Select text area:


Highlight the text layer or frame in your Figma design where you need content generated.


Provide context:


Specify the context of your design, such as the user story and acceptance criteria, to ensure the plugin generates relevant and appropriate text.


Choose UI component:


Select the specific UI component (e.g., button, link) for which you need text.


Generate and refine:


Let the plugin work its magic. Review the generated text and, if needed, refine it to achieve the perfect fit for your design.


—



Got more ideas?


Send them our way at contact@juny.com


www.juny.ai
plugins.tagline: Revolutionize your designs with AI-powered text generation

plugins.name: GIFtastic
plugins.description:
🎬 GIFtastic - Turn Your Figma Frames Into Animated GIFs

Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks! Perfect for showcasing UI interactions, creating marketing assets, or sharing design concepts.


✨ Key Features

  1. Smart & Simple
  2. Select frames and preview your animation in real-time
  3. Drag & drop to reorder frames
  4. One-click export with automatic downloads


Professional Quality

  1. 4 quality levels (64-256 colours)
  2. Multiple background options (transparent, white, black, or frame fill)
  3. Advanced dithering for smooth gradients
  4. Real-time file size preview


Complete Control

  1. Adjustable frame timing (0.05-5 seconds)
  2. Loop settings and playback controls
  3. Live preview with play/pause
  4. Memory-efficient processing


🚀 Perfect For

  1. UI/UX Designers: Showcase app interactions and user flows
  2. Marketing Teams: Create engaging social media content
  3. Product Teams: Demonstrate features and functionality
  4. Anyone: Who wants to make their designs move!


🎯 How It Works

  1. Select your frames in Figma
  2. Preview your animation with real-time playback
  3. Adjust quality, timing, and background settings
  4. Reorder frames by dragging if needed
  5. Export and download your GIF instantly


Ready to bring your designs to life? Install GIFtastic and start creating engaging animated stories from your Figma frames!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: QR code Maker
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you generate customizable QR codes with ease. Change colors, add gradients, insert logos, and create unique designs—all while keeping it simple and user-friendly. Export your styled QR codes in high-quality PNG format and enhance your designs effortlessly!


Feature Suggestions:


Prototype QR Code Generator – generate QR codes that link to Figma prototypes, making it easier to share interactive designs with clients or teams.

Design Asset QR Codes – Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links – Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames – Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation – Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.

plugins.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
plugins.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It’s perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you’re working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
plugins.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision — organize your designs by the spectrum

plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you’re ready to streamline your design process!

plugins.tagline: Enhance your design flow with Component Viewer—highlight and manage your Figma components easily!

104621.name: Component Viewer
104621.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you’re ready to streamline your design process!

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs access to all domains to fetch design assets and data dynamically.

104621.tagline: Enhance your design flow with Component Viewer—highlight and manage your Figma components easily!

plugins.name: DT组件高亮 DT Component Highlighting
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

•Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

•Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

•Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

•Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the “Show Component Highlight” button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the “Locate” button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click “Hide Component Highlight.”


Notes

•The highlighted components are based on the plugin’s interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

•The plugin’s results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件允许用户在设计中直观地高亮显示疑似组件，帮助轻松定位和管理组件。非常适合需要快速检查和交互多个组件的用户。


功能说明

•在选定的画框中高亮显示疑似组件。

•在 Figma 文件中定位并聚焦到组件。

•导出组件的缩略图以供视觉参考。

•轻松切换组件高亮状态。


使用方法

1.从 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个画框。

2.点击“显示组件高亮”按钮，高亮显示疑似组件。

3.查看带有缩略图和名称的组件列表。

4.点击“定位”按钮，放大并选择特定组件。

5.如需移除高亮，请点击“隐藏组件高亮”。


注意事项

•高亮显示的组件基于插件的解读，可能与实际组件使用情况不完全一致。

  1. •插件结果仅供参考，实际效果可能会因设计复杂性而有所不同。

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.

plugins.name: Stopwatch
plugins.description:
A simple stopwatch timer that counts up from zero and continuously updates your selected text layer in real time.

Great for prototyping timers, showing elapsed time, or just tracking activity in your design!


🔧 Features:

Live stopwatch with hh:mm:ss format

Start, Stop, and Reset controls

Automatically updates the selected text node in Figma

Lightweight and easy to use


📚 Instructions for Use

  1. Select a text layer in your Figma file
  2. Run the plugin: Plugins → Stopwatch Timer
  3. Click Start to begin counting up
  4. The time will update in your selected layer every second
  5. Use Stop to pause or Reset to clear the timer


📝 Note: Make sure the text node uses a single font like “Inter Semi Bold”. The plugin automatically loads the required font.
plugins.tagline: A simple stopwatch that updates your Figma layers in real time.

plugins.name: Universal Design (beta)
plugins.description:
UDML Exporter for Figma (beta)


Transform your Figma designs into AI-ready UDML (Universal Design Markup Language) documents. UDML Exporter creates structured, semantic descriptions of your designs specifically optimized for AI interpretation and code generation.


AI-First Design Documentation


UDML is built from the ground up to be understood by AI. Instead of trying to directly convert designs to code (which often produces messy, unmaintainable results), UDML provides AI agents with:


  1. Semantic Structure: Clear representation of layout hierarchies and relationships
  2. Design Context: Comprehensive documentation of components and their usage
  3. Style System: Organized design tokens and variables
  4. Asset Catalog: Structured references to exported graphics and icons
  5. Rich Metadata: Layer names, descriptions, and relationships that AI can interpret


Why AI + UDML?


Traditional Figma-to-code tools try to guess what components you meant to create. UDML takes a different approach:


  1. Let AI Do the Heavy Lifting: Instead of making assumptions, provide AI with rich context
  2. Semantic Understanding: AI can interpret layer names and relationships to generate appropriate components
  3. Design System Integration: AI can map your design tokens to existing system variables
  4. Framework Flexibility: Generate code for any framework or library
  5. Open and Extensible: No locked-in formats or proprietary solutions


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma using Auto Layout and components
  2. Export to UDML (optimized for AI consumption)
  3. Provide the UDML to an AI agent (like Claude or Cursor)
  4. Get clean, semantic code that matches your design system


Example AI Interpretation


<!-- UDML Export -->
<column name="user-profile-card" gap="16px">
<image name="avatar" src="assets/user-avatar.png"/>
<text name="user-name" typography="heading-medium">John Doe</text>
<text name="user-title" typography="body-regular">Senior Designer</text>
</column>


AI might interpret this as:


<!-- React Interpretation -->
<UserCard>
<Avatar src={user.avatar} />
<Heading level={3}>{user.name}</Heading>
<Text>{user.title}</Text>
</UserCard>


Perfect For


  1. Designers who want AI to understand their work
  2. Developers who need intelligent code generation
  3. Teams building or maintaining design systems
  4. Anyone looking for an alternative to traditional Figma-to-code tools


Getting Started


  1. Install the plugin
  2. Design with AI interpretation in mind
  3. Export to UDML
  4. Let AI generate your code


Design for AI


To get the best results:

  1. Use clear, descriptive layer names
  2. Leverage Auto Layout for clear structure
  3. Create consistent component patterns
  4. Document your design system tokens


Join the AI-First Design Movement


UDML is an open specification for AI-friendly design documentation. Help shape the future of AI-assisted design-to-code workflows.


docs.universaldesign.ai
plugins.tagline: Figma to code, your way

plugins.name: Just Notes
